title: "inhibition"
format:
  html:
    theme: default
---

Lib
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
vp<- read_csv(here("data", "raw_data","vp_inh_bo.csv"))
```

Make Column for Inh Vs Norm
```{r}
vp<- vp %>%
  mutate(type = case_when(grepl("i", sample)~ "inh")) %>%
  mutate(type = case_when(vp$type == "inh" ~ "inh",
                          vp$sample == "E3" ~ "inh")) 

inh<- vp %>%
  filter(type %in% "inh")
```

Plot
```{r}
inh %>%
  ggplot() + geom_boxplot(
    aes(x = sample,
        y = cq,
        color = type)
  )
```
